mapper.update: update t_orders set price=#{price},status=#{status},pay_date=#{payDate} , confirm_date=#{confirmDate} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select *,t1.id as 'oid',t1.status as 'ostatus',t1.price as 'oprice', t2.id as 'uid',t3.id as 'aid',t3.name as 'aname', t4.id as 'cpid',t4.price as 'cpprice', t5.id as 'pid',t5.price as 'pprice',t5.status as 'pstatus',t5.name as 'pname' from t_orders t1 left join t_user t2 on(t1.user_id=t2.id) left join t_address t3 on(t1.address_id=t3.id) left join t_cart_product t4 on(t1.id=t4.o_id) left join t_product t5 on(t4.p_id=t5.id) where t1.id=#{id}
